page.title: 06Old People's Homes,Hutton
page.content: Local church members were concerned about the apparent need to provide suitable living accommodation for elderly or infirm people in the local community.They wished,while maintaining their independence,to live in easily maintainable surroundings, close to other like minded people with similar requirements with a helping hand close by if required.The difficulty has been to locate either a suitable plot or a convertible building for the purpose.Currently negotiations are in hand for part of the plot now containing Hutton Populars.A development on similar lines is to be opened in early 1986, managed by Countryside Properties on a site bounded by Shorter Avenue and Chelmsford Road.
